General.Name: FTAC Emerald Acquisition Corp. Warrant
General.Description: FTAC Emerald Acquisition Corp. is a blank check company. It intends to focus on businesses in clean/renewable energy, water sustainability, agricultural technology, shared economy software, and mobility sectors. The company was formerly known as Emerald ESG Acquisition Corp. FTAC Emerald Acquisition Corp. was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
General.Address: 2929 Arch Street, Philadelphia, PA, United States, 19104
